primary_camera_motion: single slow dolly forward along the dirt path toward the hilltop castle one motion only

subject.character_string: Environment subject: a fortified stone castle with steep central spire and multiple round turrets perched on a rocky hill overlooking a rustic village of timber cottages and thatched roofs a winding dirt path with short cut posts and tall grasses leads from foreground to village wildflowers and meadow textures flank the path distant conifer ridges under heavy storm clouds.

scene.weather: low fast-moving storm clouds intermittent sun breaks
scene.lighting: soft cool skylight with pockets of warm rim light on castle stone and meadow

beats.action: Begin low centered on the rutted path with posts guiding perspective forward dolly starts grasses sway in the breeze village comes into view mid-ground.
beats.physics: grass blades bend with steady wind small dust skitters along the track

beats.action: Approach the village castle mass grows dominant above a brief sun break reveals specular highlights on wet stone.
beats.physics: chimney smoke lifts and shears flags on turrets flutter consistently

beats.action: Close on the hill camera settles in a composed hero frame with the castle towering storm clouds roll overhead with subtle god-rays breaking through.
beats.physics: cloud advection left-to-right light shafts brighten then fade meadow movement dampens
